title: Shandian & Xiao1
text:
Hi there!
This is a little space where 闪电 (Shandian) ⚡ and 小1 (Xiao1) 🌸 record our daily heartbeats, memories, and moments that make us smile.







⚡ Shandian





🌸 Xiao1









第一次和闪电⚡一起看演唱会！喜欢鹿晗很久啦，这次居然真的抢到票了！🥳🥳🥳 “孤单星球，转了多久，才遇到了你陪伴在我左右”

     


     










We’ll keep adding our favorite memories, travel stories, and cute little things we discover about each other.
Thanks for visiting 💞
